faq.title: FAQ
faq.q1: What is your typical project timeline?
faq.a1: Project timelines vary based on complexity, but typically range from 3-9 months from concept to production.
faq.a2: Yes, we work with startups and established companies alike, offering flexible engagement models.
faq.a3: We serve various industries including consumer electronics, medical devices, IoT, and industrial products.
faq.q4: Can you help with manufacturing overseas?
faq.a4: Yes, we have established partnerships with manufacturers in Asia and Europe for cost-effective production.
